definition: honorific title/form of address reserved for a queen, ancestor, emperor etc
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: More than this, the pope has been given the very titles of Deity.
sentences.chinese: 此外，更有甚者，就是教皇已僭稱了上帝的尊號。

sentences.english: Thus the most outstanding poet always desires to be made a poet laureate .
sentences.chinese: 因此最傑出的詩人總希望獲得桂冠詩人的尊號。
